name: Multiminator Demo
description:
You are the ultimate tool.

You are the ultimate weapon.

You are the ultimate everything.

You are a robot known as the Multiminator (Multi - mi - nator). You were built to be able to do anything. Or almost anything.

Play across a few levels with your many mechanics, guided by your creator! Use a grappler, teleport, and spawn grenades that will kill enemies! Fight evil rivals, grapple over land, and have fun!

Supports Quest, Rift, Vive, and more!

Voices by Nathan Blair and Dominik Spieler
